name: Lumillow
description: A fluffy pillow fairy that brings peaceful dreams to all. Its soft, cloud-like body emanates a soothing aura that can lull even the fiercest monsters to sleep.

ability.name: Dream Weaver
ability.description: Sleep-inducing moves never miss. Sleeping enemies take 25% more damage from all attacks.

moves.name: Sleepy Time
moves.description: Puts all enemies to sleep with soothing lullabies.

moves.name: Dream Eater
moves.description: Eats the dreams of sleeping targets. Heals the user for damage dealt.

moves.name: Fairy Wind
moves.description: The user stirs up a fairy wind and strikes the opponent with it.

moves.name: Rest
moves.description: Restores all HP and removes status conditions. User falls asleep for 2 turns.
